system.description: You have an innate connection to fire. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.krg2pw9p0pa5praw]{Produce Flame} cantrip. At 3rd level you may cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.z7r6plq6vyesck07]{Faerie Fire} once per long rest. At 5th level, you may cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.c9itysok7lr2ai51]{Scorching Ray} once per long rest. These do not count against the spells you know, and your spellcasting ability modifier for them is either Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma, whichever is highest.
